# mandrill Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "mandrill" {
  api_key = "MANDRILL_API_KEY"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **api_key** (String) Mandrill API Key

### Optional

- **api_base_url** (String) Mandrill API Base URL
